sentences.en: A rumor of a shortage stampeded people into laying in supplies.
sentences.cn: 缺货的谣言驱使人们囤积生活用品.

sentences.en: A rumor was soon handed around that he had been thrown into prison.
sentences.cn: 他被监禁的谣言不久就传开了.

sentences.en: A rumor was soon handed round that he had been thrown into prison.
sentences.cn: 他被监禁的谣言不久就传开了。

sentences.en: A rumor went through the town.
sentences.cn: 谣言传遍全镇.

sentences.en: Have you heard the rumor floating around that the shop is going to close?
sentences.cn: 你听到谣传说那家店要关门了 吗 ?

sentences.en: However, traders tended to discount the rumor.
sentences.cn: 然而，商人往往不相信这一谣传。

sentences.en: In fact the rumor is without foundation.
sentences.cn: 事实上，这个谣传没有根据。

sentences.en: Rumor has it that he is having an affair with his secretary.
sentences.cn: 谣传他和他的秘书有暧昧关系.

sentences.en: Rumor has it that you have grandson.
sentences.cn: 听说你有孙子了.

sentences.en: Rumor machine, stand by for a bulletin, Tanya thought.
sentences.cn: 坦妮亚心里在想, 谣言机器就要发通告了.

sentences.en: That’s twice what the unreliable rumor says.
sentences.cn: 这是那些不可靠的流言所说的两倍。

sentences.en: The rumor emanated from Chicago.
sentences.cn: 谣言来自芝加哥.

sentences.en: The rumor has been traced back to a bad man.
sentences.cn: 那谣言经追查是个坏人造的.

sentences.en: The rumor has taken air.
sentences.cn: 谣言流传开了.

sentences.en: The rumor is false, so far as I can discover.
sentences.cn: 就我所看到的实情来说,那谣言是不真实的.

sentences.en: The rumor raised much conjecture.
sentences.cn: 谣言引起很多猜测.

sentences.en: The rumor rocked the whole city.
sentences.cn: 谣言使整个城市惊慌不安。

sentences.en: There was a rumor of a flying saucer having been seen.
sentences.cn: 谣传有人看到飞碟.

sentences.en: When did you hear the rumor? - The day before yesterday.
sentences.cn: 你是什么时候听到这个谣言的？前天。

sentences.en: When the boys saw her, they would said it again and again, and more boys and girls believed the rumor.
sentences.cn: 当男孩们看见她时，他们一次又一次说这件事，一些男孩和女孩相信了谣言。
